description.default: The very embodiment of thiccness, you could drown in her. Her long legs give her silhouette a remarkable hourglass shape. Her buttcheeks are incredibly round, big, and soft, yet firm.
description.en:
The very embodiment of thiccness, you could drown in her.
Her long legs give her silhouette a remarkable hourglass shape. Her buttcheeks are incredibly round, big, and soft, yet firm.
description.es:
La encarnación misma de la voluptuosidad, podrías ahogarte en ella.
Sus largas piernas le dan a su silueta una forma de reloj de arena impresionante. Sus nalgas son increíblemente grandes, redondas y suaves, pero firmes.
description.ja:
圧倒的な肉感の象徴で、彼女に溺れてしまいそうだ。長い脚が彼女のシルエットに見事な砂時計の形を与えている。
彼女の尻は驚くほど丸く、大きくて柔らかいが、しっかりしている。
description.pt:
A própria personificação da espessura, você poderia se afogar nela.
Suas pernas longas dão à sua silhueta uma notável forma de ampulheta. Suas nádegas são incrivelmente redondas, grandes e macias, mas firmes.
